title: Row - Usage Examples (Enhanced)
description: Comprehensive row layout patterns verified against plugin source for pixel-perfect column layouts

examples.name: Simple 3-Column Row
examples.description: Basic row with 3 equal-width columns for standard layouts
examples.visualDescription: Boxed container width, 3 columns with 20px spacing, center-aligned content, 400px minimum height. Light gray background.
examples.useCase: Feature sections, service listings, card grids
examples.responsiveNotes: Columns stack vertically on mobile. Gutter space reduces to 15px on tablets.
examples.layoutNotes: Row contains tp-column blocks. gutterSpace applies as padding to each column.

examples.name: Full-Width Hero Row with Gradient
examples.description: Edge-to-edge row for hero sections with purple gradient and wave divider
examples.visualDescription: Full viewport width, 600px minimum height, purple-to-violet gradient, white wave shape divider at bottom. Content vertically centered.
examples.useCase: Hero sections, full-width banners, landing page headers
examples.responsiveNotes: Row height reduces on mobile. Shape divider scales down proportionally.
examples.visualTips: Wave shape creates smooth transition to next section.

examples.name: 2-Column Feature Row (70/30 Split)
examples.description: Asymmetric 2-column layout for content with sidebar
examples.visualDescription: Boxed width, 2 columns (70% main content, 30% sidebar), 30px gutter, top-aligned columns. White background.
examples.useCase: Blog layouts, content with sidebar, feature + image combinations
examples.responsiveNotes: Columns stack on mobile (sidebar below main content). Gutter reduces progressively.
examples.layoutNotes: Use columnPosition: 'start' to top-align columns when heights differ

examples.name: Video Background Row (Pro)
examples.description: Full-width row with YouTube video background
examples.visualDescription: Full width, 700px minimum height, YouTube video background (looped, muted), dark overlay for text readability.
examples.useCase: Premium hero sections, video showcases, immersive landing pages
warnings: Always set videoMute: true for autoplay to work (browser policy)
Provide videoImg for loading state and mobile fallback
Video backgrounds disabled on mobile for performance
examples.performanceNotes: Video backgrounds increase page load time. Use compressed videos.

examples.name: 4-Column Service Row
examples.description: 4 equal columns for showcasing services or features
examples.visualDescription: Boxed width, 4 equal columns, 25px spacing, center-aligned, light background. Perfect for icon boxes or service cards.
examples.useCase: Service showcases, feature grids, icon box layouts, team members
examples.responsiveNotes: 4 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile. Configure in individual tp-column blocks.
examples.layoutNotes: Each column should be 25% width on desktop (configured in tp-column blocks)

examples.name: Animated Gradient Row (Pro)
examples.description: Row with animated multi-color gradient background
examples.visualDescription: Full width, 500px height, gradient animates between purple, green, pink. 5-second smooth transition loop.
examples.useCase: Modern sections, creative showcases, attention-grabbing headers
examples.visualTips: Use 3-5 colors for smooth transitions. Longer animdur creates elegant effect.
examples.performanceNotes: CSS-based gradient animation has minimal performance impact

examples.name: Centered Content Row with Border
examples.description: Boxed row with border and shadow for card-like appearance
examples.visualDescription: Boxed container, white background, 2px purple border, medium shadow, 12px border radius. Single centered column.
examples.useCase: Call-out boxes, featured content, testimonial sections
examples.visualTips: Combining border, shadow, and radius creates professional card effect

examples.name: Parallax Image Row (Pro)
examples.description: Row with parallax image background effect
examples.visualDescription: Full width, 600px height, background image with parallax scrolling, dark overlay for contrast.
examples.useCase: Visual storytelling sections, feature showcases, portfolio pages
warnings: Parallax disabled on iOS/mobile - provide good static fallback
Use optimized images (<500KB) for better performance
Set parallax: true to enable effect

examples.name: Multi-Shape Divider Row
examples.description: Row with shape dividers on top and bottom for creative transitions
examples.visualDescription: Boxed width, white background, purple wave shape at top (inverted), green triangle at bottom. Creates flowing visual separation.
examples.useCase: Section breaks, creative layouts, modern page designs
examples.visualTips: Match shape colors to adjacent section backgrounds for seamless flow
warnings: Available shapes: wave, triangle, curve, clouds, zigzag
Test shape heights on mobile - may need reduction

examples.name: Space Between Columns Row
examples.description: 3-column row with maximum space between columns
examples.visualDescription: Boxed width, 3 columns with space-between alignment, pushes outer columns to edges. Great for stats or metrics.
examples.useCase: Statistics rows, metrics display, wide-spaced features
examples.layoutNotes: columnPosition: 'space-between' distributes columns with maximum spacing between

hero-row.description: Full-width hero with gradient and wave divider

content-row.description: Standard boxed row for content sections

gutterSpace.description: Padding applied to each tp-column block
gutterSpace.warning: Large values (>50px) can cause layout issues

warnings: **CRITICAL**: Never modify or regenerate block_id - causes blocks to break
Row is parent of tp-column blocks - use proper nesting
gutterSpace applies as padding to child tp-column blocks, not row itself
Video backgrounds (deepBgopt: 'bg_video') require videoMute: true for autoplay
Shape dividers may need color adjustment to match adjacent sections
Parallax effects (parallax: true) disabled on mobile devices
openBg: 1 is required before setting any background properties
openBorder: 1 is required before setting border properties
openShadow: 1 is required before setting shadow properties

commonMistakes.fix: stretchRow only works when sectionWidth is 'full'
commonMistakes.impact: Row won't stretch to full width

commonMistakes.mistake: Expecting gutterSpace to add row padding
commonMistakes.fix: gutterSpace creates padding on child tp-column blocks, use Padding for row
columnPosition affects multiple columns, not needed for single column
Configure column widths in tp-column blocks for responsive behavior

bestPractices: Use semantic HTML tags (section, header, footer, article) for tagName
Always provide responsive values (md, sm, xs) for spacing and heights
Use gutterSpace consistently across page (15px or 30px)
Configure column responsive widths in tp-column blocks, not row
Use columnPosition: 'center' for standard content alignment
Test row layouts on all breakpoints (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Match shape divider colors to adjacent sections for seamless flow

layoutContext.gutterBehavior: gutterSpace value becomes padding for all child tp-column blocks
layoutContext.fullWidthBehavior: sectionWidth: 'full' + stretchRow: true creates edge-to-edge layout
layoutContext.boxedBehavior: sectionWidth: 'boxed' creates centered container (uses theme's container width)
layoutContext.columnAlignment: columnPosition aligns multiple columns horizontally within row
layoutContext.columnCount: Number of tp-column child blocks determines actual column count
layoutContext.shapeContext: Shape dividers overflow row bounds to create seamless section transitions

performanceConsiderations: Video backgrounds increase page load time - use compressed videos
Parallax effects can impact scroll performance on slower devices
Animated gradients (bg_animate_gradient) are CSS-based, minimal impact
Large background images should be optimized (WebP format, compressed)
Shape dividers are SVG-based, lightweight and performant
Multiple video background rows on same page can cause performance issues
